# Enum

```rust enum Exp {

Val { n: i32 }, Variable { name: String, exp: Box<Exp> }, Sum { lhs: Box<Exp>, rhs: Box<Exp> },

}¶

```rust impl Exp {

pub fn eval(exp: &Exp) -> i32 {
match exp {
Exp::Val { n } => *n, Exp::Variable { name: _, exp: e } => Exp::eval(&e), Exp::Sum { lhs, rhs } => Exp::eval(&lhs) + Exp::eval(&rhs),

}

}

}¶
